mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT d.code FROM sys_user_role b LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission c ON b.role_id = c.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission d ON c.permission_id = d.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND d.deleted = 0
SELECT DISTINCT p.code FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE p.deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 AND rp.role_id = #{roleId}
